column4: hey got a quick question, in system, admin, services, i have squid checked to load, but every reboot, it shows the procs as stoped?
start it manualy then goto menu > sytem > prefs > session '  3rd tab , click save session ( make sure you only hve stuff you want to start on boot opened)
